description:
Welcome to Corel Draw X7 Training:

Corel Draw is a vector based graphic designing software which one can use for creating logos, brochures, flexes and vector designs based on creativity and lining. This course is all about learning the latest version of Corel Draw which is X7. Learning this software enables You to create any kind of logo which is printable, because we use this software mostly for printable things.

What's Included in this course?

This course aims to teach you all the important sections of Corel Draw X7, but within that You'll also learn creating practical projects in Corel Draw because this is very necessary for any software you learn. We'll have short 5 sections in this course as following:

  • Introduction & the basics
  • Corel Draw X7 Tools
  • Creating Basic Logos in Corel Draw X7
  • Understanding Corel Draw X7 Menus
  • Creating Advance Projects in Corel Draw X7
Why take this course?
In order to become a Graphic Designer, You must at least learn Corel Draw X7 or InkScape and Photoshop, so in this regard, This course will help you achive your goal.
title: Corel Draw X7 Graphic Designing From Scratch with Projects!
